title: M7: BLEU as a measure of machine translation quality
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 15 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: simply ask the student for a source sentence in a different language. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: the main objective of this activity is that the student understands that there are always lots of translations for a given input sentence and the NMT system may emit good alternatives with worse BLEU scores.
